Field Label: Individuals differ in whether or not they disapprove of people doing certain things. Do YOU disapprove of people doing each of the following?
Smoking one or more packs of cigarettes per day
Trying cocaine in powder form once or twice
Trying one or two drinks of an alcoholic beverage (beer, wine, liquor)
Taking one or two drinks nearly every day
Having five or more drinks once or twice each weekend
Sniffing glue, gases, or sprays once or twice
Sniffing glue, gases, or sprays regularly
